aka: Blood in the Blackbirds' Field. A Story of War, Justice and Resilience.
playdate: 2023-08-04(科索沃国际纪录片暨短片影展)
this_title: Ploja në “fushën e mëllenjave”. Një rrëfim për luftën, drejtësine dhe mbijetesën.
trans_title: Blood in the Blackbirds' Field. A Story of War, Justice and Resilience.
introduction: This is a story about Krusha e Madhe and the events taking place on the 25-26th of March 1999, during the Kosova war. It is a story of loss and missing people. It is also a story of survival, resilience and fight for justice to the present day.源自：https://dokufest.com/en/festival/2023/special-screenings/blood-in-the-blackbirds-field-a-story-of-war-justice-and-resilience
chinese_title: Ploja në “fushën e mëllenjave”. Një rrëfim për luftën, drejtësine dhe mbijetesën.
